document.full_text: rodrigue beaubois, once thought of as a potential x-factor for the dallas mavericks, has drifted into irrelevance due to his own injuries and the success of the mavs' offense.
document.title: rise of the mavericks, and the fall of beaubois
lines_and_colors: rodrigue beaubois, once thought of as a potential x-factor for the dallas mavericks, has drifted into irrelevance due to his own injuries and the success of the mavs' offense.
